category.name: Active Workspace Search
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: AWC_dynamicPriority_hideUnassignedValueFacetCategories
preference.preference_description: Hides the display of unassigned value facet categories from the filter panel. Valid values are: * true : All single facet categories with unassigned values are hidden. This is the default value. * false : All unassigned value single facet categories are displayed.
